head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHWARTZ, NATHANIEL H. (TAAN)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHWARTZ, NATHANIEL H. (TAAN)

block.p: SCHWARTZ-Nathaniel H. (Taan). Rabbi and cantor. On July 25, 2000. Beloved husband of Barbara. Loving and devoted father of Debbie Trink and the late David. Wonderful grandfather to David. Dear brother of Miriam, Moshe, Michel, and Aliza, and the late Chana and the late Deenah, brother-in-law to Herb and Bobbe. Admired stepfather of Janice & Robert, Randy and Michael, and Beth and Marc; and step-grandfather. Service today, 1 PM, at Sunset Chapels, 1285 Northern Boulevard, Manhasset, Long Island.

SCHWARTZ-Nathaniel H. (Taan). Rabbi and cantor. On July 25, 2000. Beloved husband of Barbara. Loving and devoted father of Debbie Trink and the late David. Wonderful grandfather to David. Dear brother of Miriam, Moshe, Michel, and Aliza, and the late Chana and the late Deenah, brother-in-law to Herb and Bobbe. Admired stepfather of Janice & Robert, Randy and Michael, and Beth and Marc; and step-grandfather. Service today, 1 PM, at Sunset Chapels, 1285 Northern Boulevard, Manhasset, Long Island.
